---
title: Azure Data Studio
---

1. Open Azure Data Studio
2. Click “Create a connection”
3. Connection type = Microsoft SQL Server
4. Server link = [sql-server-features-uclh-flowehr-ml-dev.database.windows.net](http://sql-server-features-uclh-flowehr-ml-dev.database.windows.net/)
5. Authentication type = Azure Active Directory
6. You’ll be taken to a browser page - authenticate with MFA
7. Azure AD tenant is UCLH Secure Data Environment
8. Database = sql-db-features
9. Give it a name e.g., “FeatureStore”
